subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeter hustled out an infield single in the third inning against Boston for his 3,465th hit and was removed for a pinch-runner, bringing his 20-year career to a close.
snippet: Jeter hustled out an infield single in the third inning against Boston for his 3,465th hit and was removed for a pinch-runner, bringing his 20-year career to a close.
